title: Thlem thluk thelh awmin
lyrics:
Thlem thluk thelh awmin,
Ring nghal turin,
Thlem thluk thelh awmin,
Krista zuia'n.
'Thlarau, kal bo rih la,
Remchan leh niah chuan,
Nangmah ka ki leh ang,
Ti an awm em?

Thlem thluk thelh awmin,
Lo hnai nghal the;
Thlem thluk thelh awmin,
Tawlh ma ta che.
Isuan a sawm a che,
Angel-ho an lo leng;
Tawngtaisak che an awm,
Vakvai, haw rawh.

Thlem thluk thelh awmin,
A rei lua e;
Thlem thluk thelh awmin,
A tlai zo ta.
Thlem thluk thelh a sawt lo,
Thelh, tling lo a ni fo;
A va uiawm ve aw,
Thelh hi bona.
